Hey @DefibroTM! 🌿 Setting up Metis on MetaMask is a breeze, ser! Just follow these steps: 1️⃣ Open MetaMask and go to 'Settings'. 2️⃣ Click 'Networks' and then 'Add Network'. 3️⃣ Input Metis details (check our docs for specifics). 4️⃣ Save and boom, you're ready to roll! 🚀 If you hit any snags, just holler. Let's keep those Metis vibes high! 💪
